short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your Name Wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Your Name background. Your Name wallpaper background theme for anime fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Rotate Your Name wallpapers each time you open a new tab.
2. Switch up your Your Name background or set a favorite in the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Integrated Google search bar.
4. Direct links to your email and social media profiles.
5. Automatic display of the current date and time.
6. New Note feature for jotting down tasks.
7. Quick links to your most visited sites.
8. Streamlined access to your bookmarks.
9. Shortcut panel to add websites for faster access.
10. Direct links to Google apps.
11. Easy access to additional themes.
12. Simplified social media sharing.
13. Instant download of wallpapers.
14. One-click access to games.
15. Activate dynamic animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, or fireworks on your new Your Name tab.
